item.title: Flash Crash on Ethereum! On Uniswap, ETH falls below $950 💥
item.description:
Table of Content

  1. Flash Crash on Ethereum! On Uniswap, ETH falls below $950 💥
  2. The price of Ethereum has dropped below $950.

Flash Crash on Ethereum! On Uniswap, ETH falls below $950 💥

A temporary tumble in the price of Ethereum (ETH) was recorded on decentralized exchange Uniswap overnight, briefly falling below $950. A huge whale sell on Uniswap overnight caused the price of ETH to drop even further, as the price has already lost 20% of its value over the past day.

item.description:

NFTs and Web3 are now part of MasterCard's payments network

Mastercard will offer its cardholders the ability to purchase NFTs through its payment system. A number of companies have reached agreements with the company in order to accomplish this, including Immutable X, Candy Digital, The Sandbox, Mintable, Spring, Nifty Gateway, and MoonPay.
